revisions.rev:
{{About|the actress|the location in England|Ashley Green}} {{pp-semi-blp|small=yes}} {{Infobox person | name = Ashley Greene | birth_name = Ashley Michele Greene | image = Ashley Greene Comic-Con 2011.jpg | caption = Ashley Greene in July 2011 | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1987|2|21}} | birth_place = [[Jacksonville, Florida]], U.S. | occupation = Actress, model | years_active = 2005âpresent | website = }} '''Ashley Michele Greene''' (born February 21, 1987) is an American actress and model, best known for playing [[Mary Alice Cullen|Alice Cullen]] in the [[The Twilight Saga (film series)|film adaptations]] of [[Stephenie Meyer]]'s ''[[Twilight (series)|Twilight]]'' novels. == Personal life == Greene was born in [[Jacksonville, Florida]], and is the daughter of Michele (nÃ©e Tatum), who works in insurance, and Joe Greene, a [[United States Marine|U.S. Marine]] who now owns his own concrete business.{{cite news | author=Nick Duerden | title=Dusk 'til dawn | url=http://www.ashleygreenefan.com/gallery/albums/Scans/2008/08%2011%20Nylon/002.jpg | work=www.ashleygreenefan.com | date=November 2008 | accessdate=July 18, 2009 }}{{cite news | title=Ashley Greene on Alexa Chung | url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mNlEoz1JkzU&feature=player_embedded | work=YouTube.com | date=July 16, 2009 | accessdate=July 18, 2009 }} She grew up in [[Middleburg, Florida|Middleburg]] and Jacksonville, and went to University Christian School before transferring to [[Samuel W. Wolfson High School|Wolfson High School]] when she was in tenth grade.{{cite news | author=Matt Soergel | title=From Jacksonville to Hollywood and a hit movie | url=http://www.jacksonville.com/lifestyles/2008-12-14/from_jacksonville_to_hollywood_and_a_hit_movie | work=www.jacksonville.com | date=December 14, 2008 | accessdate=December 14, 2008 }} {{Dead link|date=October 2010|bot=H3llBot}} She moved to Los Angeles, California, at the age of 17 to pursue an acting career.{{cite web | author=Christina Radish | title=Ashley Greene in "Twilight" | url=http://www.mediablvd.com/magazine/the_news/celebrity/ashley_greene_in_%22twilight%22_200811181408.html | publisher=Media Blvd Magazine | date=November 18, 2008 | accessdate=November 20, 2008 }} Greene has an older brother named Joe, who still resides in Jacksonville with their parents. Greene is good friends with her ''[[Twilight (2008 film)|Twilight]]'' co-stars, particularly [[Kellan Lutz]] and [[Jackson Rathbone]] whom she knew before filming of the series began.{{cite web | author=Rebecca Murray | title=Exclusive Interview with Kellan Lutz from ''Twilight'' | url=http://movies.about.com/od/twilight/a/kellan-lutz_2.htm | publisher=[[About.com]] | date=November 10, 2008 | accessdate=November 14, 2008 }}{{cite web | title=Ashley Greene plays Twist's Celeb Fastball! | url=http://www.twistmagazine.com/2009/03/twist-exclusive-ashley-greene.html | publisher=Twist Online | date=March 16, 2009 | accessdate=March 16, 2009 }} She dated singer [[Joe Jonas]].{{cite web|url=http://www.stumbleupon.com/su/2vkafg/www.lopeztonight.com/episode_recaps_and_highlights/ashely_greene_joe_jonas_travel.php/r:f |title=Ashely Greene &Joe Jonas Travel Misadventures | Lopez Tonight |publisher=StumbleUpon |date= |accessdate=2011-12-01}} The two broke up in March 2011.{{cite web|last=Nudd |first=Tim |url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20474242,00.html |title=Ashley Greene, Joe Jonas Break Up |publisher=People.com |date=2011-03-17 |accessdate=2011-12-01}} Greene has stated the she grew up watching [[American football|football]] and is a [[Florida Gators football|Florida Gators]] fan.{{cite web|url=http://hollywoodcrush.mtv.com/2010/07/15/espy-awards-2010-ashley-greene-tim-tebow/|title=Spotted: Ashley Greene With A Major Sports Star At The Espy Awards!|publisher=MTV.com|accessdate=January 8, 2011}} She was also seen attending a [[Green Bay Packers]] game against the [[New York Giants]] with Jonas and [[Jessica Szohr]] at [[Lambeau Field]] in 2010.{{cite web|url=http://www.packers.com/news-and-events/article-1/Fans-Celebrate-The-Season-Packers-Style/74780e50-165c-4b85-a9a4-769a60942698|title=Fans Celebrate The Season Packers Style|publisher=Packers.com|accessdate=January 8, 2011}} In 2009, nude self portraits of Greene were leaked onto the internet. Her attorneys threatened to sue various websites that published the pictures.{{cite web|last=Orloff |first=Brian |url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20297082,00.html |title=Ashley Greene Threatens Legal Action over Nude Pictures - Scandals & Feuds, Ashley Greene |publisher=People.com |date=2009-08-10 |accessdate=2011-12-01}}{{cite web|url=http://www.cbsnews.com/2300-504083_162-5236792-2.html |title=Ashley Greene Nude Pics Hit Web Pictures |publisher=CBS News |date=2008-11-15 |accessdate=2011-12-01}}{{cite web|last=Duck |first=Charlotte |url=http://www.glamourmagazine.co.uk/celebrity/celebrity-news/2009/08/11/ashley-greene-in-naked-pictures-scandal |title=Twilight star Ashley Greene threatens to sue over naked pictures (Glamour.com UK) |publisher=Glamourmagazine.co.uk |date= |accessdate=2011-12-01}}{{cite web|last=Condie |first=Suzanne |url=http://www.azcentral.com/ent/celeb/articles/2009/08/12/20090812people081209.html |title=People: 'Twilight' star Ashley Greene nude photo scandal |publisher=Azcentral.com |date=2009-08-12 |accessdate=2011-12-01}} == Career == She initially planned to become a model, but was told that she was not tall enough at 5'5" to be a fashion model and should instead focus on acting in commercials. After taking commercial and acting classes, she fell in love with acting and realized that she preferred it over modeling. Greene graduated from high school early and moved to L.A. to pursue an acting career. Since then, she has appeared as a guest on such television programs, as ''[[Punk'd]]'' and ''[[Crossing Jordan]]''. Greene's big break came in 2008 when she was cast as [[Mary Alice Cullen|Alice Cullen]] in ''[[Twilight (2008 film)|Twilight]]'', a film based on the [[Twilight (novel)|novel of the same name]] by [[Stephenie Meyer]]. She reprised her role as Alice in the 2009 sequel to ''Twilight'', ''[[The Twilight Saga: New Moon]]'', 2010's ''[[The Twilight Saga: Eclipse]]'', and will reprise the role again in 2011, in ''The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1 and Part 2''.{{cite web | author=Jocelyn Vena | title=Ashley Greene Says 'New Moon' Script Tops 'Twilight' | url=http://www.mtv.com/movies/news/articles/1605673/story.jhtml | publisher=MTV | date=February 23, 2009 | accessdate=March 30, 2009 }}{{cite web |author=|title=Peter Facinelli, Ashley Greene, Kellan Lutz, Jackson Rathbone, Elizabeth Reaser, Nikki Reed, and Billy Burke Sign on to BREAKING DAWN; Plus Three New TWILIGHT: ECLIPSE Posters|url=http://www.collider.com/tag/the-twilight-saga-breaking-dawn/|publisher=Collider |date=May 19, 2010 |accessdate=May 20, 2010 }} Greene portrayed Michelle Burkham in the drama film ''Skateland'', which premiered at the 2010 [[Sundance Film Festival]].{{cite web | author=Brad Miska | title=Ashley Greene Conjures Up 'The Apparition' | url=http://www.bloody-disgusting.com/news/19537 | publisher=[[Bloody Disgusting]] | date=March 21, 2010 | accessdate=March 21, 2010 }} She reunited with her ''Twilight'' co-star [[Kellan Lutz]] in the movie ''Warrior''{{cite news | author=Larry Carroll | url=http://moviesblog.mtv.com/2008/12/19/twilight-siblings-ashley-greene-and-kellan-lutz-reunite-as-love-interests-in-warrior/ | title='Twilight' Siblings Ashley Greene And Kellan Lutz Reunite As Love Interests In 'Warrior' | publisher=MTV | date=December 19, 2008 | accessdate=December 19, 2008 }} and also stars in thriller film, ''[[Summer's Blood]]'',{{cite web | title=Summer (2009)| url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1285010/ | publisher=[[IMDb]] | accessdate=August 15, 2009 }} as well as the [[Dark Castle Entertainment]] production ''[[The Apparition]]'', which began filming on February 1, 2010.{{cite web|url=http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/34423/twilight-sagas-ashley-greene-may-be-seeing-apparition |title=Twilight Saga's Ashley Greene May Be Seeing an Apparition |publisher=Dreadcentral.com |date=February 1, 2010 |accessdate=May 1, 2010}}{{cite web|url=http://www.clevvertv.com/movie-news/12250/ashley-greene-and-sebastian-stan-film-the-apparition.html |title=Ashley Greene and Sebastian Stan Film The Apparition | ClevverTV â Latest Teen Entertainment News, Gossip, Movie Previews, Music, and More! |publisher=ClevverTV |date=April 1, 2010 |accessdate=May 1, 2010}} Appearing nude in a bodypainted bikini, Greene posed for [[SoBe]] advertisements that ran in the 2010 issue of the ''[[Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Edition]]''.{{cite web|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2010/01/08/ashley-greene-naked-bodyp_n_416074.html|title=Ashley Greene Naked & Bodypainted For SoBe|work=The Huffington Post|date=January 8, 2010|accessdate=January 9, 2010}} She received "The Style Icon Award" at Hollywood Lifeâs Young Hollywood Awards this year.{{cite web|url=http://www.hollywoodlife.com/2010/04/23/ashley-greene-style-icon-award/|title=BREAKING NEWS! Ashley Greene Will Receive The Style Icon Award At HollywoodLifeâs Young Hollywood Awards!|work=Hollywood Life|date=April 23, 2010|accessdate=April 27, 2010}} Greene was also presented an award from the [[PETA]] foundation for representing [[Avon Products|Avon]] and their no testing on animals policy.{{cite web|url=http://blog.peta.org/archives/2010/07/twilight_star_snags_peta_award.php |work=PETA foundation|date=July 8, 2010| accessdate=July 11, 2010 |title=Twilight Star Snags PETA Award}} Greene presented an award at the [[2010 MTV Video Music Awards]] on Sept. 12, 2010.{{cite web|url= http://www.tvguide.com/celebrities/ashley-greene/297359 |title= Ashley Greene|date=September 9, 2010|publisher=TVGuide.com }} == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
